summary: This document contains multiple entries of financial transactions involving LSJ Employees LLC and Jeffrey Epstein, detailing various credit and debit transactions made through Fedwire. The transactions primarily involve large sums of money transferred to and from LSJ Employees LLC, with various beneficiaries and purposes outlined.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the originator of multiple financial transactions to LSJ Employees LLC.
Transactions range from $150,000 to $800,000, indicating significant financial activity.
All transactions are processed through Deutsche Bank Trust Company America and FirstBank Puerto Rico.
The document includes both credit and debit advice for various payments made by LSJ Employees LLC.
Several transactions are noted as being without signature, indicating they are electronic transfers.
